text: Wendy Williams ’ s talk show took a terrifying turn on Tuesday morning when the host fainted on live TV. Williams, dressed in an elaborate Statue of Liberty costume, started introducing the show ’ s annual Halloween costume contest toward the end of the hour. “ We do it every year, it ’ s always a lot of fun — let ’ s get started, ” she said. Then you can see what happens next : Wendy Williams passed out during a live broadcast of her show after getting overheated in her costume # WendyWilliams pic. twitter. com / wPKU2Gwmsv — 24 / 7 Pop Culture ( @ 247PopCulture ) October 31, 2017 The clip flew around Twitter as startled viewers tried to figure out what happened.
